title: Yasuo's Windwall
body:
Think it needs a longer cool down or a nerf of some sort cause that shit broken af, also his e should have a 1/2 second cooldown
If you're a mage midlane like orianna or syndra, you fucked {{champion:134}} {{champion:61}}

replies.body:
>also his e should have a 1/2 second cooldown

Nah man, it's funnier watching the Yasuo's feed their asses off, and continue to feed because all they can do is go in.
I love the ones that dash multiple times into turret range and all you have to do is *boop* them.
Where do you find these people?? Why can't I play with them?
Apart from Rymeister, all Yasuo's are bad, especially Top Yasuo.
His wind wall could do with a change of some sort maybe. Reduce in width? I think the cd is not so much a problem.
I agree, revert it to giving him flow when he uses e, and make it small again, why the fk you even need such a large wal
